channel.title: Community Events on Westview Bridge Club
channel.description: Recent content in Community Events on Westview Bridge Club

item.title: First Community Event
item.description: This is our first Bridge community event overall and at the Avamere at Hillsboro Senior Living Center. We had a lot of fun interacting with the seniors there and playing Bridge together.

item.title: Bringing Generations Together Through Bridge
item.description: Laurel Parc Community Volunteering Event 2/5/2023: This is our first community volunteering event at Laurel Parc Senior Living Center. We met many expert players and learned a lot during this community event.
